content: Career PFF Panel 3 Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 Mar 2019If i own/run a relatively small business, should i put my cash back into the business to grow it even further or should I invest them? Any self-employed or business owners able to advice? 1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Dawn FionaLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 03 Mar 2019If your business generates higher returns than what you would get from investing it (in the stock market / any other financial instrument), then you should put the cash to grow your business.Go with the one that gives you higher returns.0 comments0
